inn1.comm: moves it back in straightaway, Angelo on target, Warner gets across and defends
this was short of a length outside off and he stays right behind the line and defends
this was a touch fuller and he gets across and pushes it to the off side
angles it across and Warner pushes it to the covers and tells his partner to stay back
full and moving across him and he comes across and he drives it to cover
gets across for a forward pushes it just wide of cover for a single, Australia are underway
Warner not so much in control of that one, tried to work it off his pads and he gets a leading edge
lands it on middle and he clips it away to the on side
jaffa! Kula gets one to kick up off a good length and it zips past the outside edge, that should encourage the quicks
this was too short and wide outside the off stump, he moves across and thumps it wide of cover point
Hughes was in a bit of a tangle there, nips back in and it hits him high on the pad and rolls away

Warner slaps it straight to mid-off! This wasn't exactly Mathews' best bal, it was short and wide and deserving to be hit, Warner chased it and flat-batted it towards mid-off, Eranga jumped and cupped it over his head and nearly fluffed it as the ball slipped out of his hand as he tried to throw it away in celebration. The umpires had a look for a few seconds but were convinced he was in control. Nervy moment for Eranga
stays beside the line and he steers it to the off side
brings it across the left-hander and Hughes shoulders arms
gets across him and he pushes it to the off side
lands it outside off and he watches it through to the keeper
gets forward and across and Clarke pushes it just wide of point
Hughes gets a leading edge wide of the slips for a couple
drifts just wide down the leg side, the batsman tries to clip it away fine
squared him up! Hughes circumspect by one that swung in a bit late and sneaked past the bat and pad
stays behind the line and punches it to the off side
fullish in length outside off and he comes forward and defends
holds the length back a little and he stays behind the line and defends
kicks up a bit more and Clarke was trapped at the crease, hit him just above the groin
not the most convincing drive, pushed it off the toe of the bat but he managed to find the gap at point
short of a length and he tucks it down to midwicket
stays back and works it to the off side for a single
more solid in defense now, goes back and across at the crease and defends
fuller and angling across him and he watches it to the keeper

the captain's sharp at slip! A circumspect Hughes walks back, Kulasekara angled it across the left-hander from over the wicket, it was full and moving away, Hughes was looking to run it down to third man and that would have been okay had there been just one slip, Jayawardene moved quickly to his left at second slip and took it low
nervy start for Hussey as he slashes outside off and misses
fuller delivery and he gets across and defends
pitches it up and he clips it to midwicket
Mathews sprays that full and wide, looking for the drive but Clarke doesn't oblige
this was full and a touch wide again and Clarke watches it to the keeper
not this time! After seeing off two similar full and wide deliveries he chases this one, slaps it off the front foot past cover
hits a good length outside off and he leaves it alone
goes for another drive past the covers off the front foot but he finds the fielder this time
moves it away from him and he leaves it alone
poor delivery, Kula off target this time, full on the pads and Hussey gets a gentle edge down to fine leg, races away

Appeal for a caught behind and Hussey has been given not out, and SL are reviewing it. This one nips back in from outside off, Hussey was looking to cut, there was a sound as the ball passes the bat and Perera takes it well diving to his left. Kettleborough didn't pick it up and Mahela wanted it reviewed, Hot Spot showed a thin inside edge

Bailey pads up and Aus have lost two in two! Kulasekara's inswing is really causing trouble to the right-handers, moved back in and Bailey was forward and across to shoulder arms, the ball hits his pads and he was in front of the off stump
Wade clips the hat-trick ball wide of square leg for a couple
lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
moves away from him outside off and he leaves it alone
bowls that full and he gets well forward and defends to the off side
pitches it up and he pushes it towards mid-off
this was fuller in length and Clarke was well forward and knocked it to cover
stays beside the line and he works it to point
stabs at this one and it rolls down to point
that was too full and wide outside off and he doesn't chase that
he tucks it down to square leg for a single
just moves away from him and he doesn't offer a shot
comes forward and across and he works it to midwicket
good length on the off stump and he clips it down to midwicket
sharp bouncer but Kulasekara is penalised for height
tries to clip it to the on side and he mistimes it
terrific stop at backward point, it was short and wide outside off and it looked like four, Sri Lanka are sharp today
Malinga beats the outside edge! That was close, sprayed it full and moved it back in and Wade was forward
gets forward and across and he knocks this one down to point
this one traps him on the pads but it was too high, it skidded through, squared up for pace
full on the pads and he works it down to short midwicket
attempts a yorker but it's a low full toss which he clips wide of midwicket for a couple
this was not too far of the off stump and Wade decided to let it go at the last minute

The middle stump has been pushed back and Kulasekara has picked up his fourth! He gets the Australian captain, Kula's inswing to the right-handers is causing havoc at the Gabba, Clarke was looking to play down the ground but left a gap between pad and bat, the ball sneaked through and knocked back the stump
clips it away down to square leg for a couple

Five for the road for Kula and Australia are a trainwreck at the Gabba! That inswing again, needs no further mention, Henriques gets across and he too is bowled through the gate, hits the top of the stumps
Johnson's squared up! Just beats the left-hander and he was too slow to move across
stays behind it and clips him away to the on side
and once again he is beaten, Kula's on fire
moves back in late and he clips him down to midwicket, didn't quite time it
this was sprayed too full, low full toss in fact which he clips wide of midwicket
really tests Wade this time with a short one which he awkwardly fends away to the off side
that's a sharp bouncer and Wade has to bend down quickly to evade that
get down quickly Mr Wade! Another tester from Malinga, short and sharp, runs at a premuim
pitched up and moving away and he leaves it alone
full on the off stump and he has a waft at it, close to the edge
fullish delivery on the off stump and he gets across and defends
Kula comes round the wicket this time to the left-hander, Johnson gets his pad across and shoulders arms
pitched up and he pushes it just wide of cover
returns over the wicket this time and Wade doesn't offer a shot

Appeal for an lbw and the batsman is given the benefit of the doubt and Sri Lanka are reviewing it. It was a sharp inswinging yorker, Johnson was looking to clip it with the angle, the ball was swinging too much and would have missed leg stump, good call by the umpire
full on the off stump and he pushes it towards mid-off
fuller delivery leaving him and he lets it go to the keeper
fullish in length outside off and he punches it to the off side
sneaks past the bat-pad gap again! Malinga gets one to move back in late and Johnson was squared up, not far from the stumps

the attrition rate gets worse for the hosts! Malinga gets this one to move towards middle stump from over the wicket, Johnson tries to work it away to the on side, the ball hits his pad and then heads towards middle stump, almost through the gate
fuller delivery moving away and he doesn't offer a shot
pitches it on the leg stump and he turns it away to midwicket
fuller delivery and he clips it wide of square leg, has to hurry for the single
just nips away from him and he gets an inside to the pads
angles it across the left-hander and he shoulders arms
Starc does well to keep out that inswinging yorker, comes back into him at some pace
could have sneaked through but he got an inside edge to the pads!
fires that yorker outside the off stump and Starc just about gets his bat down and digs it out
rare lapse in the field, Starc digged that out towards mid-off and Jeevan Mendis makes a mess of it

Now even that score of 70 looks days away! Soft dismissal for Wade, this was pitched up and moving away from the left-hander, he tries to steer it square on the off side but ends up spooning a catch to backward point
this one skids through and he pokes his bat out and misses it, what does a No.10 do with that?
Kula runs in for his ninth, fullish and wide outside off and he carves it in the air over backward point, bit of excitement there as it went in the air
stays behind the line and he defends to the off side
this one jags back in and squares him up! Extra bounce and not far from the edge
moves this one away from the right-hander and he safely leaves it alone
this was full and bending back in and McKay was forward and across and hit on the pads, stifled appeal but he was struck outside the line
just short of a length and he defends back to the bowler
nips back in and he gets an inside edge that rolls to midwicket
sneaks past the outside edge, moved away and skidded through and McKay didn't move his feet

caught behind! This could have sent back even a genuine batsman, Malinga gets this one to move away from the right-hander, McKay was caught at the crease and couldn't move across to cover the line, thin edge and Perera takes it
few more of those and 70 will get closer! Pitched up and swinging away from the pads and he gets a touch to it and it races past the keeper
drifts back in and he stays back and clips it to fine leg, inside edge in fact
fires in the yorker on the off stump and Starc just about squirts it out to the bowler
Kula runs in for his final over, on target on off and middle and he defends to the off side
good length on the middle stump and he knocks it to square leg
always dangerous when you pad up! But for Doherty this one landed outside leg and was hitting him too high anyway
stays just behind the line and steers it to the off side
moves it across him and Doherty moves across and he shoulders arms
he can't sneak in a sixth! Fullish on the stumps and Doherty quietly defends
a rare shot that finds the gap! Starc pushes a full ball wide of cover and Eranga does really well to chase and pull it back before the rope
fiery yorker on the off stump and Doherty does a fine job squirting that out
he now follows that up with a bouncer! Doherty does well to duck and get under that one
follows it up with a full delivery wide of the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
stays beside the line and defends to the off side
yorker just outside the off stump and he pokes his bat out and nearly offers a catch to the keeper
short of a length and Starc stays back and defends high on the bat
stays back and he clips him wide of midwicket for a single, every run cheered...who would've thought?...
fuller delivery on middle and off and he defends
inside edge and it squeezes past the stumps! Loud cheers again
drifts on the body and he easily knocks it to the on side for a single, one more
goes back and he defends to the off side
Eranga runs in trying to sneak in a wicket, full outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
the cheers are on as he chases a full and wide delivery and carves it wide of backward point, Kula fields at third man and more applause as Starc takes the second and gets to double figures...finally
full on the stumps and he punches it towards mid-off
pushes it with soft hands towards cover and he tells his partner to wait
looked like an inside edge to the pads, rolls to the off side, anyway it was hitting him too high
stays back and across and stabs it to the off side
fullish on the pads and he knocks it to mid-on
drifts back in and he clips it wide of square leg, they think of a second but decide against it
just leaves him outside off and Doherty decides to leave it in the last minute
fullish in length outside off and he knocks it to the off side
good length on the off stump and he comes across and knocks it to the off side
70 is getting closer! This was a poor delivery from round the wicket, wide outside off and Doherty helps himself to a scoop over the covers, the field's up

appeal for a catch but it looked like it hit Starc's helmet, it was a short delivery and he swiveled to hook and the ball brushed past the glove and lobbed off the helmet to point, the Sri Lankans thought it hit glove but Reiffel wasn't so sure. Good decision by the umpire, Starc asks for a change of helmet
the last wicket pair's showing the way! Lovely shot, this was on the pads and he clipped it away high and far over midwicket
Starc cops another blow on the helmet! He's not playing the bouncer well, bat and glove far away this time though
stays behind the line and he defends to the off side
fullish in length outside off and he comes across and leaves it alone
he manages to put away the bouncer this time! He swivels and hooks and doesn't control it all too well, manages to sneak it past the rope and the fielder in the deep who dives
lands it outside off from over the wicket and he leaves it alone
shuffles at the crease and he tucks it away to  square leg
goes back and across and stabs it towards mid-off
waits for the ball and he tucks it to square leg, one short of their lowest score
good length and across him and he stays back and defends
so Australia go past their lowest score of 70! Loud cheers as Doherty gets across and thumps it past cover, the field's up
nearly chipped this one back to the bowler! Eranga stuck his right hand out and it beat him
continues round the wicket, bowls that full and he gets across and shoulders arms
stays beside the line and steers it down to point, Starc's told to wait
so 74 it is! Soft dismissal to end the innings and fitting too when you look at the scorecard, he was trying to work it to the on side, leading edge popped up to cover

inn2.comm: stays back and knocks it to point
just leaves him outside off and he knocks it to the on side
Jayawardene makes room and tries to launch it over cover but misses
extra bounce this time and he stays back and knocks it wide of short leg
full outside off and he reaches out and hits it hard past cover, beats cover but can't find the boundary

Warner takes a brilliant one at backward point! That will lift Australia's sagging spirits, this was short and wide outside off, Mahela was on his toes to cut that, moved quickly to Warner's left and he threw himself to his left and took it with both hands, sharp reflexes
he oversteps and it's full and he mistimes the drive to mid-off
hoicks it away one-handed! Was he trying a cross-court forehand? Didn't really come off well
swings it across him and he comes across and defends to the off side
chases and full and wide one and close to the edge there, the ball moved away a bit too much
follows that up with a yorker and he pushes it down to mid-off
stays behind the line and he punches it to the off side
another false shot, Thirimanne makes room and comes forward and tries to bash it past mid-off but he misses it completely
now it's Dilshan turn to swing and miss, it's an epidemic, short of a length outside off and he slashes, extra bounce this time
this one kicks up a bit more and he stays back and knocks it to the on side awkwardly
full on the off stump and he mistimes it to mid-off

edged and let off! Clarke at slip, this was short of a length and moving away and he slashed and got a thick outside edge that flew past Clarke at first slip, was too late to react and Hussey was a bit too far too at second slip
Dilshan is more careful this time as he leaves it alone
Thirimanne throws the bat out again at a full and wide delivery shaping away outside off, looks like an edge is around the corner
Starc bowls that wider outside off and gets it to move away, he doesn't offer a shot this time
good length delivery seams away and he steers it down to point
beats him! This one comes back in just a little and he was forward to defend, the ball sneaks past the edge
this was full and moving away and he steered it to the off side, a sharp stop at gully saves a few runs surely
lands it outside off and he punches it to the off side
much better, shows the full face of the bat and he covers the line and punches it to mid-off
lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
lost track of the 'swing and a miss' - this was slower, outside off and he was pushing at it away from the body
drills a full delivery down towards mid-off for a couple
he was watchful outside the off stump this time, saw it through to the keeper
Dilshan opts to watch this one through to the keeper as well, better carry through to Wade
better delivery by McKay, had Dilshan in two minds whether to play or leave, decides not to play at it
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and clips it towards square leg
Starc gets some good late inswing, nearly had Dilshan in a tangle, awkwardly clipped wide of short leg but in the gap
Dilshan ought to have put that away, full and swinging in and he ended up getting an inside edge to his pads
another full one and he ends up drilling it down to mid-off
that was too short and wide and Dilshan couldn't resist, slashed and missed and he was beaten for pace and bounce
swing and miss No.67 - Starc gets this one to move back in and Dilshan leaves a big gap between pad and bat, sneaks through and misses the stumps
he connects well this time, full on the stumps and he reaches forward and crashes that past mid-off
Dropped by Bailey! This was full and angling across and he chased it, scooped it low and down to gully and Bailey had it covered but it slipped out
gets across and shoulders arms
short of a length on middle and off and he stays back and defends
short of a length outside off and he leaves it alone to the keeper
for a change a solid shot by Thirimanne! He chipped down the track, gave himself room and sliced it on the front foot past the gap between point and gully, nice shot really
comes forward and he's beaten and the Australians go up for a catch but the umpire's not interested, looked quite close
full outside off and he drills it back to the bowler
comes forward when he should have stayed back, he meets it above the pad and awkwardly fends it off
goes for the drive and he's beaten
it's a friendly half volley and Dilshan gets forward and bashes it down the ground, Starc sticks his left hand out in vain
should have put this one away too, swings too early and gets an inside edge to midwicket, Dilshan shows his frustration
drifts on the body and he knocks it to the on side
another slash and miss, this was wide outside off and he was driving away from the body, children don't watch these bits
this one is a touch wider and he withdraws the shot at the last minute
angles it on middle and leg and he clips it to the on side
this was a beautiful delivery! Can't blame the batsman here, nips back in and he is totally squared up, looked at first like he edged it
moves away and he slashes hard at another one and misses, yet another...
stays back at the crease and he punches it towards the off side
reaches out and he drills it down towards mid-off

strange old Dilshan innings comes to an end in a freakish manner, Johnson bowled it on a good length outside off, Dilshan was looking to shoulder arms but the ball straightened and took the outside edge to first slip, he wasn't offering a shot
stays back at the crease and he steers it to the off side
goes right back at the crease and defends solidly
solid in defense again, Johnson keeps it short if a length
he's beaten this time, McKay gets good away movement, he comes half forward and pokes at it
he makes room and tries to crash that anywhere on the off side, he misses this one
full on the stumps and he clips it down to fine leg
that away movement again, Perara pokes his bat out and the ball moves across him and beats the bat
chases a full and wide one and he scoops it over cover, didn't time it all that well
gets across and punches it off the meat of the bat to mid-off
he sprays this one wide down the leg side and wide called

take that! Warner's seeing it like a foot ball! Johnson fires that on a good length and Thirimanne makes room and tries to bash that past point, Warner's reflexes are sharp, catches it with both hands, made that look easy

Sri Lanka have lost two in two and the hosts are smiling again! Mathews gets a brute of a delivery from Johnson, it was short of a length and gaining on his body, he had barely enough time to make up his mend whether to duck or fend it off, took his eyes off the ball and the top edge lobbed tamely to Starc who ran across from short midwicket
that was not a bad hat-trick ball at all! And well kept out by Tharanga, he gets his bat down and keeps out a yorker
full on the off stump and he drags it down to mid-on, no fielder there, they're all on the off side
stays back at the crease and he knocks it to the off side
stays back a the crease and Kushal soliudly pushes it to the off side
lovely drive! That was overpitched on the off stump, he went forward and merely pushed it along the ground wide of mid-off, fielding not sharp enough
slants it across him and he leaves it alone
fullish in length outside off and he comes across and doesn't offer a shot
stays back at the crease and he punches it to the off side
fullish on the off stump and he softly clips it towards mid-on
that had 'hit me' written all over it, this was short and wide and he stays at the crease and slaps that over backward point
short of a length and he stays back and defends high on the bat
that was a slower ball full and wide outside off and he went forward and checked his drive, just beat backward point, well played actually
solid in defence on the back foot, off the middle of the bat
comes round the wicket this time, fires that short and across him and he punches it to the off side
ends the session with a bouncer from round the wicket, he does well to duck and leave it alone
lands it outside off and he safely leaves it alone
keeps it outside off and he pushes it away with the angle to the off side
gets across his stumps and defends solidly down the track
smoked that away! This was full and wide outside off and Kushal went forward and slapped that past cover, fielders hardly moved
tries to work that away to the on side, hits him high on the pad
this was short and wide outside off and it had to be smashed, ended up playing away from the body but he kept it down and placed it wide of short cover
they're doing this quickly, 3rd four after the break, this was a half volley outside off and he went forward and across and smashed that wide of cover, poor ball and put away
good length outside off and he leaves it alone
stays beside the line and he opens the face of the bat and steers it towards third man
this one comes back in and he gets an inside edge to the pads

....and Australia sneak in another! Strac bowls this full and wide and across the left-hander, Tharanga pushes at it away from the body, thick outside edge to Clarke who falls low to his left at first slip
appeal for an lbw but it's an inside edge to the pads
impressive square cut but straight to backward point, try getting it past Warner today
poor ball really, short and wide outside off, at a gentle pace, he had enough time to get across and thrash that in front of square on the off side
drifts on the pads and he tucks it away down to square leg, they push for the second
times that forward punch really well but he can't get it past cover
lands it a shade outside the off stump and he leaves it alone to the keeper
short and wide and he could have put that away, stopped by one of the two men at short cover
bowls that short of a length, he stays right back at the crease and defends high on the bat
tries to work it away to the on side but the ball clips his pads and it rolls to the off side

chance for a run-out! He punched it towards cover and set off for a single, for some reason they decided against it and Kushal had to turn around, Johnson picked up, had enough time to aim but he missed the stumps, Kushal was not even in the frame
just short of a length and he pushes it down to short cover
Mendis gets off the mark with a push towards cover
yorker sneaks past the stumps, the inside edge, everything
fullish in length outside off and he defends solidly to the off side
gets across and he leaves it alone to the keeper

Dropped by Warner of all people would you believe this! Kushal tried to chip it over the on side and got a thick top edge, swirled towards cover and Warner was under it, miles up in the air and he fluffed it
goes for another slog and he misses this one completely, what's happening guys?
just moves away and he's beaten
gets forward and across and defends, no risk this time
drills a half volley down the track and Starc fields
good delivery, it was gaining on him and he did well to fend it off with soft hands
another half volley and it was solidly punched down the track, Starc gets a hand to it

another throw away! Mahela sighs in the dressing room, this was on a good length and Jeevan shaped to pull in front of square, gets a top edge, slips and falls at the crease and McKay ensures he takes it at midwicket
fires in the yorker outside off and he tries to dig it out
finishes it off with a boundary! They really huffed and puffed getting there didn't they? Bowls that full outside off and he opens the face of the bat and steers it past gully
